analyzed: dad dang ldan ba jug ba yang

analyzed: bu brlab bdag sgom ju ba dang dor dang mig byed lha bogs dang dam chu blud cing sgrog ba dang sku gsung thugs kyi dam sgrog ba

analyzed: bsre dang brtan byed ming dbang skur
